argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( J e. RR /\ ( L e. RR /\ M e. RR /\ N e. RR ) ) -> J e. RR ) |
| 2 |  | #P_resubcl | |- ( ( L e. RR /\ M e. RR ) -> ( L - M ) e. RR ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_3adant3 | |- ( ( L e. RR /\ M e. RR /\ N e. RR ) -> ( L - M ) e. RR ) |
| 4 |  | #P_simp3 | |- ( ( L e. RR /\ M e. RR /\ N e. RR ) -> N e. RR ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_resubcld | |- ( ( L e. RR /\ M e. RR /\ N e. RR ) -> ( ( L - M ) - N ) e. RR ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( J e. RR /\ ( L e. RR /\ M e. RR /\ N e. RR ) ) -> ( ( L - M ) - N ) e. RR ) |
| 7 |  | #P_simpr2 | |- ( ( J e. RR /\ ( L e. RR /\ M e. RR /\ N e. RR ) ) -> M e. RR ) |
| 8 | 1, 6, 7 | #P_ltadd1d | |- ( ( J e. RR /\ ( L e. RR /\ M e. RR /\ N e. RR ) ) -> ( J < ( ( L - M ) - N ) <-> ( J + M ) < ( ( ( L - M ) - N ) + M ) ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_recn | |- ( L e. RR -> L e. CC ) |
| 10 |  | #P_recn | |- ( M e. RR -> M e. CC ) |
| 11 |  | #P_recn | |- ( N e. RR -> N e. CC ) |
| 12 |  | #P_nnpcan | |- ( ( L e. CC /\ M e. CC /\ N e. CC ) -> ( ( ( L - M ) - N ) + M ) = ( L - N ) ) |
| 13 | 9, 10, 11, 12 | #P_syl3an | |- ( ( L e. RR /\ M e. RR /\ N e. RR ) -> ( ( ( L - M ) - N ) + M ) = ( L - N ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( J e. RR /\ ( L e. RR /\ M e. RR /\ N e. RR ) ) -> ( ( ( L - M ) - N ) + M ) = ( L - N ) ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_breq2d | |- ( ( J e. RR /\ ( L e. RR /\ M e. RR /\ N e. RR ) ) -> ( ( J + M ) < ( ( ( L - M ) - N ) + M ) <-> ( J + M ) < ( L - N ) ) ) |
| 16 | 8, 15 | #P_bitrd | |- ( ( J e. RR /\ ( L e. RR /\ M e. RR /\ N e. RR ) ) -> ( J < ( ( L - M ) - N ) <-> ( J + M ) < ( L - N ) ) ) |
